title: Who is Shailaja Paik, the Dalit scholar who was awarded Rs 67 lakh MacArthur 'genius' grant?

summary: India-born historian and author Shailaja Paik became the first Dalit scholar to be awarded the coveted MacArthur Fellowship, often called the ‘genius grant.’ The 50-year-old history professor recognised for her pioneering work in Dalit studies, gender, and sexuality in modern India, will receive an impressive $800,000 (approximately Rs 67 lakh) to support her ongoing research
